text:
Created attachment 26699
JMeter AMF Sampler Source

I would like to submit the attached source code for integration as a "built in" JMeter sampler for testing Flex/BlazeDS applications using Adobe’s AMF Protocol over Http.  This implementation is a subclass of HTTPSampler2 and provides extension points for custom AMF messages using a mechanism borrowed from the AbstractJavaSamplerClient concept.

Unfortunately, the BlazeDS library is licensed under LGPL v3, which cannot be included in ASF releases.

I'm trying to find out about having an optional dependency on LGPL.
creator: sebb@apache.org

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
It does not have to use the TestBean interface (though that makes it simpler to add property files). So long as it implements the correct interfaces you can just package it in a jar and stick it in lib/ext, and put any library dependencies in lib/.

Try it and see.
This plugin is now being maintained as a google code project at http://code.google.com/p/jmeter-amfsampler/.
